'''Special Almond Tofu''' is a quest item given by [[Smiley Yanxiao]] and used in the [[Archon Quest]] "[[Wangshu]]" and Quest Event "[[While It's Warm]]." The icon and name are identical, but the descriptions differ.

Notably during the Archon Quest "Wangshu", it is prepared for [[Xiao]] at the [[Traveler]]'s behest.

==Trivia==
* The player cannot consume this item.
